attributes.action: ask are you man or mouse on computer mice ?! fund padded mosuemats and computer screens in public libraries and schools to prevent repetitive strain injuries and macular degenration that occurs with computer use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does the British govt know, care or intend on doing anything about the pain I am suffering ? I would hate anyone else to go through this, so am urging the P.M. to consider this preventative health measure : supply libraries with padded mousemats. Plesae legislate to ensure ALL employers take repetitive strain injuries seriously and fund the proper equipment for their workers - or is it only members of high society who the welfare state cares for ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
